title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate powerhouse for your vehicle! With its incredible 4000A peak current, this jump starter is designed to provide maximum power to get your engine roaring back to life. Whether you have a gas engine or a massive 10.0L diesel engine, this jump box will have you up and running in just a matter of minutes.

Equipped with a high capacity 27800mAh battery, this automotive battery jumper pack is not only powerful but also portable. Its compact body allows you to take it anywhere, making it perfect for emergency situations or outdoor adventures. With two USB charge ports and a type-C input and output, this jump starter also doubles as a portable battery charger for all your USB devices.

Safety is our top priority, which is why our jump starter is built with intelligent protection systems. From short circuit and low battery protection to high temperature and reverse connection prevention, you can trust that your vehicle and the jump starter are always safe. The sturdy and durable metal clamps ensure a secure connection, and the included jumper cables are of sufficient length for convenient use. Plus, the jump starter features a prompt indicator and a buzzer to guide you through the correct operation.

But the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter doesn't stop there! It also comes with a multifunctional LED light that offers three working modes: flashlight, SOS, and strobe. Whether you're camping, experiencing an emergency, or simply need some extra light, this jump starter has got you covered.

With your purchase, you'll receive the AVAPOW Portable Battery Starter, jumper cables, a USB-C cable, a cigarette lighter converter, a convenient carry case, and a user manual. And as if that's not enough, we also have a professional 24-hour online after-sales team ready to assist you with any issues.

Don't miss out on this incredible deal! Get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and experience the power, reliability, and convenience that every driver needs. Please note that no adapter is included, but you can use any USB type charger to charge the jump starter.

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate solution for all your automotive jump-starting needs. With its powerful 4000A peak current, this jump starter is designed to provide maximum power, allowing you to start 10.0L diesel engines and any gasoline engines in just minutes. 

Equipped with a high-capacity 27800mAh battery, this jump starter offers exceptional performance and portability. Its compact body makes it perfect for use anywhere, and with two USB charge ports, it can also serve as a portable battery charger for your devices. The type-C input and output enable convenient type-C charging USB support.

Safety is a top priority with the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. Its intelligent protection systems prevent short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection, ensuring a reliable and secure jump-starting experience. The metal clamps of the jump starter cables provide ruggedness and durability, ensuring they won't break in the long run.

Not only does this jump starter provide powerful performance, but it also offers upgraded fast charging capabilities. With dual USB 3.0 output ports, it charges your devices 75% faster than ordinary mobile power sources. Compatible with almost all USB charging devices, including mobile phones, tablets, cameras, and kindle, it is a versatile and essential tool for any situation.

In addition, the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter features a multifunctional LED light with three working modes (flashlight/SOS/strobe), making it a handy emergency tool. The super bright LED lights provide convenience for night use, making it perfect for camping, outdoor activities, emergencies, and travel.

With your purchase, you will receive the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, jumper cables, USB-C cable, cigarette lighter converter, carry case, and user manual. Plus, our professional 24-hour online after-sales team is always ready to assist you with any issues you may encounter.

Don't let a dead battery ruin your day. Get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and experience the power, reliability, and convenience it offers. Please note that no adapter is included, but all your cell phone USB type chargers can be used to charge the jump starter.

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter - the ultimate solution to jump-starting your vehicle with maximum power and reliability. With a whopping 4000A peak current, this jump starter can effortlessly start any 10.0L diesel engine or gasoline engine in just minutes. 

Equipped with a 27800mAh high-capacity and portable battery charger, this jump starter is designed to provide you with unparalleled convenience. It features two USB charge ports and a type-C input and output, allowing you to charge multiple devices simultaneously. The fast charging technology ensures that your devices are charged up to 75% faster than ordinary power banks, making it compatible with almost all USB charging devices including mobile phones, tablets, cameras, and more. 

Not only does the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter offer exceptional power, but it also prioritizes your safety. With intelligent protection systems such as short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection, you can rest assured knowing that your vehicle and devices are in safe hands. The sturdy and durable metal clamps prevent any breakage, and the length of the cable provides added convenience during use. The jump starter also features a prompt indicator and buzzer to ensure correct operation.

In addition to its impressive power and safety features, this jump starter is also a multifunctional tool. It comes with a built-in LED light that offers three working modes - flashlight, SOS, and strobe - making it an essential tool for emergencies, outdoor activities, camping, and travel. The super bright LED lights provide enhanced visibility during night use, further adding to its versatility.

With your purchase, you will receive the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, jumper cables, USB-C cable, cigarette lighter converter, carry case, and a user manual. Plus, our professional 24-hour online after-sales team is always ready to assist you with any issues you may encounter.

Don't miss out on this powerful, reliable, and versatile AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. Get yours today and experience the ultimate peace of mind on the road. Please note that no adapter is included, but you can use any USB type charger for charging the jump starter.
generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product that will attractive to buyers. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below.

---

Title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger

Description: Our AVAPOW 4000A Jump Starter is a Supersafe and reliable automotive jump starter offering the users maximum power. This jump box has a 4000A peak current. You can use it to start 10.0L diesel engine and any gasoline engines in a few minutes. The 4000A Peak 12V car battery pack jumper booster comes with 88Wh high capacity and portable battery charger.It designed with 27800mAh and two USB charge ports. This automotive battery jumper pack can be used anywhere for its compact body.It is equipped with type-C input and output, which enables it to supports type-C charging USB. The other outstanding thing about this best battery jump starter for the large engine is its ruggedness and super security. This jump starter cables are all made of metal clamps to prevent them from breaking in the long run.

POWERFUL & LARGE CAPACITY - AVAPOW car jump starter provides up to 4000 peak current, 27800mAh capacity can start all 12V cars (Including hybrid power), motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, snowmobiles, etc. easily in just a few minutes. (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel) - up to 40 times on a full charge.

INTELLIGENT PROTECTION - With intelligent protection systems such as short circuit, low battery, high temperature and reverse connection. The jumper clamp is designed to be sturdy and durable, and the cable of sufficient length is more convenient to use. The jumper box has a prompt indicator and a buzzer to indicate correct operation.

UPGRADED FAST CHARGING - Not only a lithium car starter, but also a portable car power supply with a high capacity of 27800mAh. It uses dual USB 3.0 output ports (USB 1: 5V /3A 9V /2A 12V /1.5A; USB 2: 5V / 2.4A and the Charging speed is 75% faster than ordinary mobile power. Compatible with almost all USB charging devices, including mobile phones and tablets, cameras, kindle, etc.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL LED LIGHT - This car battery jump starter features three working modes of built-in light (flashlight/SOS/strobe), which can be used as an emergency tool. Super bright LED lights provide more convenience for night use. This multifunctional flashlight is perfect for camping, outdoor, emergency, travel, etc.

WHAT YOU GET - 1 X Portable Battery Starter,1 X Jumper Cables,1 X USB-C Cable, 1 X Cigarette Lighter Converter, 1 X Carry Case,1 X User Manual, and professional 24-hour online after-sales team for any issue. Tips: No adapter included (All your cell phone USB type charger could be used to charge the jump starter.).
